# du4tnr: Data Utility for Transparency and Reproducibility

This package was originally developed to help student scholars in their
statistical research with a specific dataset.

All datasets are removed and it is being used a general purpose package
for collaboration between students.

Transparency and Reproducibility are achieved through: - using a table
(Data Frame or CSV file) to document initial cleaning steps, - using a
database storage for datasets.

For more information, see
[vignette](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/articles/du4tnr.md).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`briefSummary()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/briefSummary.md)
  : Generating Summary Tables for levels of a categorical response.

- [`cleanDS()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/cleanDS.md)
  : Cleaning a Dataset

- [`cont_table()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/cont_table.md)
  : Contingency Table

- [`dbObj()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/dbObj.md) :
  dbObj creates an object with a connection to a SQLite database file
  and a set of functions for recording and retrieving variables in the
  dataset.

- [`describe_ds()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/describe_ds.md)
  : Describe a Dataset

- [`total_col()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/tableSummary.md)
  [`total_row()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/tableSummary.md)
  :

  Summarizing Functions for `table` Object

- [`setNAs()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/varClean.md)
  : Variable cleaning functions

- [`whichds()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/which_ds.md)
  [`which_ds()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/which_ds.md)
  : Searching a column name in datasets (data frames)

- [`mcrBin()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/xvalid.R.md)
  [`misMul()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/xvalid.R.md)
  [`misMulOH()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/xvalid.R.md)
  [`mse()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/xvalid.R.md)
  [`cvGlm()`](https://manabdoli.github.io/du4tnr/reference/xvalid.R.md)
  : K-Fold Cross Validation and Accuracy Functions
